actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Frederick Law Olmsted Home and Office in Brookline, Mass., as a national historic site.

summary.text: Establishes the Frederick Law Olmsted Home and Office in Brookline, Massachusetts, as a national historic site. Authorizes to be appropriated sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Frederick Law Olmsted Home and Office in Brookline, Mass., as a national historic site.
